Class ConnectionServerRMI

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject

    ConnectionServer, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote

extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject

        Specified by:
        tapSet in interface ConnectionServer
        Parameters:
        title - title of the card
        roundSchemeDice - a chosen dice from the round scheme
        dicesToMove - the set of chosen dices of the map to be moved

        row2Mit - the current row position of the second dice on the map
        column1Mit - the current column position of the first dice on the map
        column2Mit - the current column position of the second dice on the map

        column1Dest - the column coordinate of the first dice where to be positioned on the map
        column2Dest - the column coordinate of the second dice where to be positioned on the map
        roundSchemeDicePos - the position of the chosen dice on the round scheme
